Name: 夏まつりのハナビィ Hanaby's Summer Festival
About the game: The third game in the Hanaby series. Hanaby, the main character, and apprentice pyrotechnician, goes on an adventure to revive the long-paused 'Summer Festival'. Collect the magic stones called 'Tourmalines' in order to restore the ruined railroad. Redesigned fireworks system From this title, fireworks have been changed to disposable packages. Also, a new fireworks category 'Cracker' has been added, expanding the range of strategies. A whole new element: Hanafuda Challenge Hanafuda Challenge is a way to earn money by collecting Hanafuda cards in automatically generated stages. The more 'Koi-koi' you call, the higher your winnings will be, but each time you call, the damage multiplier of Hanaby will increase. Please finish the challenge in the right place. BGM Again, all BGMs were created by 'AAAA'. Both keyboard and gamepad are supported If you have a gamepad, please connect it. You can do mapping gamepad buttons within the game. Please try to connect your gamepad and play with it. What is the Hanaby series? It's a 2D platformer game where Hanaby the squirrel pyrotechnician defeats enemies by using fireworks while adventuring.
